name: SQL queries for beancount
tagline: Sample queries for the SQL-like Beancount Query Language. Contribute your own by creating an issue or submitting a pull request.
body:
# Introduction

This is a list of example SQL queries for [`beancount`](http://furius.ca/beancount/). It should be a reference and inspiration for users of `beancount`. 

If you want to contribute and add your own query to this list please create an issue or submit a pull request here: [github.com/aumayr/beancount-sql-queries](https://github.com/aumayr/beancount-sql-queries) 

For more information about the SQL-like query language for `beancount` visit the [Beancount Query Language documentation](http://furius.ca/doc/query).

# Queries

### USD-Expenses in 2015, grouped by month

```sql
SELECT
  MONTH(date) AS month,
  SUM(COST(position)) AS balance
WHERE
   account ~ 'Expenses:' AND
   currency = 'USD' AND
   YEAR(date) = 2015
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;
```

### Account Balances in 2013

```sql
balances FROM year = 2013
```

### Balances of accounts which contain "`Phone`" in their name

This query shows the balances of accounts which contain "`Phone`" in their name, 
on each day a transaction was made on that account.  

```sql
SELECT
  date, account, position, balance 
WHERE 
  account ~ 'Phone';
```
